page.title: 15CLAUGHTON BRICKS:BARGH'S
page.content: Claughton Brickworks uses clay quarried on the fell to the south-east and tran- sported to the works by aerial ropeway. The manager refused to provide inform- ation because he disapproved of teach- ers'strike action in support of higher wages during the period of the project. Bargh's Claughton Warehouse opened 10 years ago.The 50 year old firm has a haulage business at Caton and another warehouse in Lancaster.The Claughton depot stores and delivers fertizers to farmers in the Lune valley,and sugar and syrup for Tate and Lyle all over the north as well as paper products for Bowater Scott.It employs 5 local men. It is situated between the brickworks and Claughton Institute,a small wooden structure with ante-rooms and a hall where village and sometimes private functions are held.
